content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Storage and Supply System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (40.5, -83.5) containing coal.
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -83.5) containing coal.
- Wooden chest at position (42.5, -83.5) containing coal.
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal and supplying it to the chest at (40.5, -83.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) supplied with iron ore and coal.
- Burner inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) transferring items from the furnace to a wooden chest at (2.5, 0.5).
- Wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) receiving iron plates.
- Belt group connecting positions (3.5, 0.5) to (5.5, 0.5), facilitating item transport.

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) supplied with copper ore and coal.
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 0.5) transferring items from the furnace to a wooden chest at (12.5, 0.5).
- Wooden chest at position (12.5, 0.5) containing copper plates.

### Storage and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (7.5, -0.5) for storage.
- Wooden chest at position (7.5, 0.5) for storage.
- Burner inserter at position (6.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests.
- Burner inserter at position (8.5, 0.5) waiting for space in the destination.
- Belt group connecting positions (40.5, -83.5) to (38.5, -83.5), facilitating item transport.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from contains the desired items. Check the inventory of the entity before attempting extraction.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for source items
- Make sure the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Regularly check and replenish the source inventory if necessary.

### Errors when inserters are waiting for space in the destination
- Ensure that the destination entity has enough space to accommodate the items being transferred. Regularly clear or expand storage to prevent blockages.

### Errors when attempting to harvest resources
- Ensure that your inventory has enough space to accommodate the resources you intend to harvest. Clear space in your inventory before attempting to harvest more resources.
